title: New: Francis Lung – This Night Has Opened My Eyes (The Smiths Cover)
body:
Covering **The Smiths** is never easy, mainly due to the fact that almost every single one of their tracks are recorded to complete and utter perfection, with the unique atmospheric quality that the Mancunian outfit possessed.

Fellow Manchester based artist **Francis Lung**, of **WU LYF** fame, does his utmost best and pulls off a fantastically poignant acoustic rendition of _This Night Has Opened My Eyes_. Stripping away the Marr guitar line is a bold move, however adds an extra level of melancholy and indecision to the track. Check it out below.
